description:
Maka, Soul, Black☆Star, and Tsubaki tangle with the mad scientist responsible for turning Sid into a zombie - the amazingly powerful Dr. Stein!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La forma dell`anima. Arriva Franken Stein, il più forte maestro d`armi?
La forme de l`âme. Dr. Franken Stein, le plus puissant des Meisters ?
Shape of the Soul: Enter the Ultimate Meister Stein?
Tamashii no Katachi: Saikyou Shokunin Stein Toujou?
魂のかたち ~最強職人シュタイン登場?~
